name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the incident was exposed, netizens questioned a marriage announcement on the official Weibo account of Hemophilia Home, and Hemophilia Home immediately started to criticize netizens.
The marriage announcement was posted on June 16, and it was for the 49-year-old chairman of Hemophilia Home, Guan Tao (suspected account owner). The other party is required to be 18-35 years old and of Russian ethnicity.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 20, Guilin Nanxishan Hospital was severely flooded, resulting in 1,200 doctors and patients being trapped in the hospital (data source: media). When breakfast was distributed that morning, there was not enough food and a large number of patients gathered at the scene, causing chaos. The nurses held on to the food tightly to prevent looting.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
During Xi Jinping's visit to Shaanxi to hold the Military Commission Political Work Conference, the Xi'an EMU Depot under the Xi'an Bureau of China Railway issued a notice
Special trains are not allowed to stop along the railway line or under the bridges. At the same time, new energy vehicles are prohibited from entering the depot.
It seems that the central government does not trust domestic new energy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 20, in Guilin, Guangxi, the scene was in a mess after the water receded on Liuhe Road. Residents picked up the food soaked in water on the ground.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"More and more little guys are appearing"
On June 20, a primary school student who was about to graduate in Henan Province released a video pointing out the problems of the school. He complained that the school's breaks were too long, "the time to go to the toilet was very tight", the leaders spoke for too long during the flag-raising ceremony, and the school library did not allow students to enter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 19, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. A boss owed employees wages and threatened them: "You are still calling to complain at work" and "Do you want to die?"
The employees said that everyone has submitted labor arbitration.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/As2V8hDM2N

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 21 (Release) Liaoning Fuxin. A woman reported the abbot of the Shengjing Temple in Zhangwu County, Liaoning, whose secular name is Bao Changjiang and whose Dharma name is Losang Jinmei Nima, online. He tricked her into becoming his mistress when she was 19 years old. She said her mother died in a car accident when she was 19, and the abbot said, "If I sleep with him, my mother can become a Buddha, and I can become a Buddha too."
The Zhangwu County Ethnic and Religious Affairs Bureau responded that the woman's statement was untrue and the police have been notified.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In 2021, a collapse accident also occurred at the construction site of Chengdu Metro Line 17

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 21, the Supreme People's Court, the Supreme People's Procuratorate, the Ministry of Public Security, the Ministry of State Security, and the Ministry of Justice jointly issued the "Opinions on punishing the crimes of splitting the country and inciting splitting the country by "Taiwan independence" diehards in accordance with the law", which will be implemented from the date of issuance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 21, a construction scaffolding collapsed at a residential building on Tianfu Road in Guangzhou, trapping people. Firefighters have rescued many people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At 3:50 a.m. on June 21, the road surface collapsed near Jinli West Road on Chengdu Metro Line 13 under construction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of June 21, an explosion occurred in a street restaurant in Sizhuang Town, Jincheng, Shanxi Province. Video footage showed that part of the nearby building collapsed, house glass was shattered, and some residents were injured. As of 10:30, all five trapped people had been rescued and sent to the hospital for treatment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the Chengdu subway pavement collapsed, Chengdu Metro and Chengdu Water Company accused each other of causing the accident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of June 20, a boy in Chengdu jumped off a building because his parents accused him of playing with his phone. On June 21, a girl in the second year of high school at Qingdao No. 1 Middle School jumped off a building because her teacher confiscated her phone. Her parents defended their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 21, Meixian County in Guangdong, Shexian County in Anhui, Guilin in Guangxi, Longyan in Fujian and other places after the floods receded.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: So far, the floods have caused 38 deaths and 2 people missing in Pingyuan County, Meizhou, Guangdong.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 20, Wuhan Jianshe Automobile Passenger Transport Co., Ltd. issued an announcement that cruising taxis have reached the brink of death. In order to avoid causing greater social conflicts and group petitions, five major demands were made to the government.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 21, Xi'an Bank issued an announcement that Vice President Di Hao passed away on June 18.
An internal document of the bank stated that a person fell to his death from the Xi'an Lushang Center Building on the 18th. The person who fell was Xi'an Bank Party Committee member and Vice President Di Hao.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 21, the Legal Society Newspaper published an article on the "Diplomatic Immunity Sister" incident, calling for mercy and an end to online violence against the 58-year-old woman who has worked hard for the country all her life. The article said that in the face of pressure from public opinion, Yu Qi bravely stood up and apologized publicly. We saw her sincerity and haggardness. This old woman who once made great contributions to the country's aerospace industry has now suffered a heavy blow because of a small mistake. Her experience makes us feel heartbroken and regretful.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A contribution from villagers in the disaster-stricken San'an Village, Wangcun Town, She County, Huangshan: Currently no one from above has come, there is no news, and the village cadres have not come forward either. The victims have to rely on themselves to save themselves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"There are many strange things in the Rakshasa Kingdom"
A document from the Health and Health Bureau of a county in the east shows that Zhao, an employee of the county hospital, was defrauded of 50,000 yuan because her friend's WeChat was stolen.
Because of being defrauded, the county health and health bureau criticized her in a notice, deducted 1,000 yuan from her performance, cancelled her qualification for evaluation, and was not allowed to be promoted within two years. The hospital where she worked deducted 100,000 yuan from her performance.
Netizens in the comment area said that after being defrauded, the police would advise the victim not to file a case because it would affect the evaluation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Contribution from disaster victims in Santai Village, Jiaoling County, Meizhou City, Guangdong Province

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: 40 minutes ago: Huangbei Village, She County, local communications are currently interrupted, and it is unknown when the rescue team will arrive. 1 hour ago: Residents of Gaojing Village, Sencun Township, She County reported: No one is rescuing, water and electricity are cut off, and there is a lack of food, and rescue is urgently needed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of June 21, Shantou, Guangdong. According to merchants in Chikeng Town, the Qingkeng Farmers' Market originally belonged to the village collective land, but some cadres privately contracted the market land to a third party. After the third party renovated it, merchants had to pay seven or eight times the previous price to enter the market. This move caused dissatisfaction among merchants, and a large number of merchants protested in the market for their rights. During the period, they had physical conflicts with law enforcement officers, and some merchants were injured and fell to the ground.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of June 21, Lanzhou University’s official account suddenly published content related to the graduation ceremony with the title “8964”.
It was then urgently deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Due to the lack of channels for seeking help, flood victims in She County, Huangshan can only seek help in the comment section of each video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 15, Hunan. A newlywed couple took wedding photos by the river. Not far away, a rescue boat was salvaging bodies.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 20, some users discovered that the Animation Garden website was suspected to have been attacked. At that time, any search terms entered in the search bar would jump to the square suicide note of Xiao Jie, a victim of the June 4th Massacre.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 20, Guilin Water Conditions

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 14 (Release), Nanchang, Jiangxi. Many students from Jiangxi Institute of Technology reported to blogger "Ji Jing (Brother Yi)" that the water quality in the school dormitories was poor. Some students even had red spots all over their bodies after taking a shower. The school also prohibited students from installing water purifiers privately. After the blogger came to the school for testing, he found that the tap water in the dormitories was not only of poor quality, but also had wriggling worms.
June 15 (Release)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens discovered that the subtitles of Hong Kong TVB's TV dramas added "China" before Hong Kong.
